content: quick cute and no sew this sweet jelly bean goldfish works up quickly and easily great for little gifts craft tables decor and more pattern pack discounts use code 2patterns10 for 10% off 2 patterns 3patterns15 for 15% off 3 patterns 4patterns20 for 20% off 4 or more patterns these discount codes are for individual patterns only and cannot be combined with other offers e-books pattern bundles etc pattern is written showing light super bulky weight 6 yarns feel free to experiment with your favourite amigurumi yarn and adjust your hook size accordingly usually 2-3 sizes smaller than the hook size recommended on the yarn label crochet hook 5 0mm h clover amour crochet hook materials 2- 10mm safety eyes optional stuffing polyfil removable stitch marker yarn needle to weave in ends scissors yarn light super bulky 6 - hobbii honey bunny yardage main colour - peach orange 15 yards accent colours - medium weight white small amount abbreviations/stitches chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet single_crochet - single_crochet scdec - single_crochet decrease slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s -stitch es *to* - repeat the sequence between the ** the number of times indicated yo - yarn over gauge 4 rounds of gauge pattern = 2 0 inch light super bulky gauge pattern create a magic_ring round 1 6sc in the ring 6 round 2 2sc in each stitch 12 round 3 *single_crochet 2sc* 6 times 18 round 4 *single_crochet in the next 2 sts 2sc* 6 times 24 measurements/sizes 3 5 inches skill level intermediate love this pattern check out more great free and premium patterns on my blog www darlingmapledesigns com join our newsletter http //tinyurl com/darlingmapledesignsnewsletter let s be friends instagram https //www instagram com/darlingmapledesigns/ facebook https //www facebook com/darlingmapledesigns/ community group https //www facebook com/groups/575618923156267/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/darlingmapledesigns/boards/ youtube https //youtube com/c/darlingmapledesigns thank you so much for visiting my shop if you have any questions about this pattern or any of the patterns in my shop please feel free to email me at info@darlingmapledesigns com have you made this pattern i d love to see your beautiful work please tag my business page darling maple designs or use the hashtag #darlingmapledesigns this pattern has been tested by experienced pattern testers a huge thank you to those that tested this design your help is truly appreciated please feel free to sell any finished items made using this pattern but please link back to this pattern and reference myself as the designer all photographs on this page and in the pattern are copyright protected and cannot be used to sell or promote your items
